title: Subpart 8186-26 - 1992 Market Value Survey Procedures
content:
Subpart 8186-26 - 1992 Market Value Survey Procedures

State Regulations
§ 8186-26.1 - Definitions
§ 8186-26.2 - Market value surveys; generally
§ 8186-26.3 - Valuation date; taxable status date
§ 8186-26.4 - Designation of base year rolls
§ 8186-26.5 - Preparation of classified roll
§ 8186-26.6 - Allocation of initial sample size to survey unit and class
§ 8186-26.7 - Determination of intervals and final sample size
§ 8186-26.8 - Stratification of the utility class and appraisal of sample parcels
§ 8186-26.9 - Appraisal of sample parcels in ordinary classes and large units
§ 8186-26.10 - Computation of estimated market value ratio
§ 8186-26.11 - Supplemental sample
§ 8186-26.12 - Corrections to the survey data
§ 8186-26.13 - Completion of survey
§ 8186-26.14 - Requirement for sale inventories

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
